text: Ugo Humbert was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Nicola Kuhn won the title after defeating Pavel Kotov 6–2, 7–6(7–4) in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Open Castilla y León - Men's Singles 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 Open Castilla y León – Men's Singles
